summary: Changes the appearance of Delphine, Karliah, Sapphire, Tonilia, Vex, and Mjoll.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/h6HhOPQ.png?1[/img]
[color=#ffff00]
[size=5]First and foremost - If you do not like this mod then move along, please. This is simply a personal mod of mine that I decided to share. I do plan on updating and adding more NPCs over time. It is just a goal of mine and figured I might as well share in case others like it.

[/size][/color][color=#3c78d8][size=6][u][b]What is this mod and what does it do?

[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=4]This mod changes the appearance of 6 NPCs in the game so far. Changes have been made to heir facial structures, hairstyles, face textures (removed dirt),  eye color, and brows. With that said, I did not drastically change the colors of their eyes or their hair because I wanted to keep it as close to the original as possible. (Sapphire is the exception here because I wanted her eyes to reflect her name).

[/size][color=#3c78d8][size=6][u][b]NPCs changed so far:

[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=4]Karliah
Mjoll the Lioness
Delphine
Sapphire
Tonila
Vex
[/size]

[color=#3c78d8][size=6][b][u]Planned NPCs to change:

[/u][/b][/size][/color][size=4]Aela[/size]
[size=4]Aeri[/size]
[size=4]Astrid [/size]
[size=4]Anwen[/size]
[size=4]Avrusa[/size]
[size=4]Brelyna[/size]
[size=4]Camilla[/size]
[size=4]Carlotta[/size]
[size=4]Faralda[/size]
[size=4]Grelka[/size]
[size=4]Iona[/size]
[size=4]Jenassa[/size]
[size=4]Jordis[/size]
[size=4]Lydia[/size]
[size=4]Muiri[/size]
[size=4]Njada[/size]
[size=4]Ria[/size]
[size=4]Saadia[/size]
[size=4]Sylgja[/size]
[size=4]Ysolda[/size]

[size=4]More to be added to this list~[/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=6][u][b]Skin textures and Body Types?
[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[size=4]This mod does not contain any skin textures or body types. I originally considered including standalone versions that used certain body types and textures, but there are so many and it would take forever to make everyone happy. So, the NPCs will use whatever body type and skin textures you are currently using.   [/size]

[color=#1155cc][size=6][u][b]Recommended Mods: 

[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=4]Better Females by Bella Natural Edition
High resolution Scars
Sky Female Textures
Face Light
[/size]To add more~


[color=#ffff00][size=6][b]Installation and Requirements:
[/b][/size][/color]
[size=4]Requires: Skyrim up to date
No DLCs required yet.

To install: Use NMM or manager of your choice. OR drag and drop extracted files to the Skyrim data folder.

[/size][color=#3c78d8][size=6][u][b]Credits:

[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=3]KS Hairdos - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?
Eyes of Beauty - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?
Eyes of Aber - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?
SG Brows - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?
Apachii Hair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
